title: Sound On: Calls for Cuomo Resignation, Crypto (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Calls for Cuomo Resignation, Crypto (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Tina Davis, Bloomberg News Legal Executive Editor, New York Republican Congresswoman Nicole Malliotakis, Ben Bain, Bloomberg News SEC reporter, Kristin Smith, Executive Director of the Blockchain Association, Jodi Schneider, political news director for Bloomberg TV and Radio, and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
